title: Draven Passive
body: I find that draven's passive is too bad. you only can kill one hundred minion than you get 150 that is too rubbish. If the passive like this, I think draven is not worth 6300 ip. it's better to change a little bit or change the passive. do you guys agree this? compare the old passive of draven, the passive we use now is much worse than that one.

replies.body: Note; you've also got his passive wrong. It's 2x stacks, and there's other aspects involved. Go read the full description.

I wouldn't really say it's 'bad'; it allows for easy snowballing and can also help you catch up. What i find annoying is the fact that it's useless in games where i don't ever get a kill (e.g. top and mid feed, and I'm bot vs safe enemies) though these games aren't too common for me
because the old one was broken. And riot always said they want to change it so just wait.
